scripts.build: rm -rf dist; cd react-app; npm run build-prod; cd ../angular-app; npm run build; cd ../; cp -R static/* dist/
scripts.deploy-dev: firebase use default; firebase deploy --only hosting:tapit-app-dev
scripts.deploy-testing: cd angular-app; npm run build; cd ../react-app; npm run build-prod; cd ../; firebase use default; firebase deploy --only hosting:tapit-app-testing
scripts.deploy-prod: cd angular-app; npm run build-prod; cd ../react-app; npm run build-prod; cd ../; firebase use production; firebase deploy --only hosting:tapit-app-production
